title: Crypvent
author: Crypvent
content: Looking for a buyer for my LBC account with a trust level score of 30+:Trade volume: 10-20 BTCNumber of confirmed trades: 250+ Account created: 4 years agoEmail: VerifiedPhone number: Verified ID, Passport or Driverâ€™s license: VerifiedFeedback score: 99 %Price: 0.1BTC (negotiable) via recommended bitcointalk escrow services listed here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Crypvent on June 26, 2022, 10:00:13 AMLooking for a buyer for my LBC account with a trust level score of 30+:~Snipped~Price: 0.1BTC (negotiable) via recommended bitcointalk escrow services listed here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0Quote from: Crypvent on July 05, 2022, 08:58:46 AMbumpEven if you manage to persuade one of the reputable escrow providers to handle this deal [highly unlikely], it still doesn't change the fact that nothing can stop you from recovering it in the future!- The bolded part in the first quote "only" gives a false sense of security to potential buyers!

comments.author: Crypvent
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on July 06, 2022, 04:33:44 PMQuote from: Crypvent on June 26, 2022, 10:00:13 AMLooking for a buyer for my LBC account with a trust level score of 30+:~Snipped~Price: 0.1BTC (negotiable) via recommended bitcointalk escrow services listed here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0Quote from: Crypvent on July 05, 2022, 08:58:46 AMbumpEven if you manage to persuade one of the reputable escrow providers to handle this deal [highly unlikely], it still doesn't change the fact that nothing can stop you from recovering it in the future!- The bolded part in the first quote "only" gives a false sense of security to potential buyers!Seems you are new to this. Sold another account 4 yrs ago and used minerjones as escrow and everything went smoothly. No complaints to date.

comments.author: vkter
